title: Physiology Simulation and PACS Integrated Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental medical/life science knowledge and IT system operation experience
context.additional_context: Customized training for collaboration between current medical and IT practitioners.

learning_goals: Normal and abnormal responses of human body systems can be accurately analyzed using physiology simulation tools.
The core functions of PACS systems (image storage/retrieval/sharing) can be independently operated in practical settings.
Collaborative protocols can be developed to bridge knowledge gaps between medical and IT fields.

resources: Virtual environment for PACS practical training
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
